Text:
Hmmmm. I wondered........ Ok, requests? Sure I have a request: City of Angels. 

Meg Ryan, Nicolas Cage made in 1998. A very good chick flick/tear jerker!
Oh oh oh and Boys On The Side, please (I know I forgot to say that before, sorry) It's got Whoopi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Berrymore, and Matthew McConaughey made in '95. Thanks.
